articles.author: Catherine Thorbecke
articles.title: Elizabeth Holmes made an 'attempt to flee the country' after her conviction, prosecutors say
articles.description: Elizabeth Holmes made an "attempt to flee the country" by booking a one-way ticket to Mexico in January 2022, shortly after the Theranos founder was convicted of fraud, prosecutors alleged in a new court filing Friday.

articles.title: Beyoncé ticket rush expected as pre-sale begins for UK tour dates
articles.description: Demand is expected to be high to see the singer take her acclaimed Renaissance album on the road.
articles.content:
Beyoncé fans are bracing themselves for the rush to get tickets for her first solo tour for seven years, as the first pre-sale opens for her UK dates.

articles.title: Man Gets Cut In Line at Publix And Ends Up Winning $1 Million On A Lottery Ticket
articles.description: A Delray Beach, Florida man scored a winning scratch-off ticket this week after he was cut off in line at a ticket machine.
articles.content:
Sometimes a minor inconvenience might result in the biggest stroke of luck.
